channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Should gun store sales get special credit card tracking? States are split
item.description: A new national divide is emerging among states over whether to track sales by gun stores

item.title: A private call of top Democrats fuels more insider anger about Biden's debate performance
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: 6/29: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Authorities say teen armed with replica gun fatally shot by police after chase; The barcode marks its 50th anniversary

item.title: 'Lab-grown' meat maker hosts Miami tasting party as Florida ban goes into effect
item.description: As Florida’s ban on “lab-grown” meat is set to go into effect, one manufacturer hosted a last hurrah with a cultivated meat-tasting party in Miami

item.title: Gov. Newsom signs law allowing restaurants and bars to charge service fees with prior disclosure
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: How to watch the Tour de France today
item.description: Wake up to the best cyclists in the world competing in the 2024 Tour de France. Find out how to watch today.

item.title: Hundreds attend vigil after police shooting of teen who allegedly wielded replica gun
item.description: Three Utica, New York, police officers are under investigation after one shot and killed a 13-year-old boy who allegedly pointed a replica handgun, investigators said.

item.title: After president's debate debacle, Jill Biden delivering the message that they're still all in
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: 11 hurt when escalator malfunctions in Milwaukee after Cubs-Brewers game
item.description: A downward escalator from the terrace to the loge level malfunctioned and sped up, the Brewers said.

item.title: Biden campaign argues president dropping out would 'lead to weeks of chaos'
item.description: President Joe Biden's campaign sent a fundraising appeal to supporters, saying the president dropping out would only "lead to weeks of chaos."

item.title: Israel FM to Iran: regime threatening destruction deserves destruction
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: "48 Hours" show schedule: A summer of crime time double features
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: 11 people injured when escalator malfunctions in Milwaukee ballpark after Brewers lose to Cubs
item.description: An escalator malfunctioned at American Family Field in Milwaukee.

item.title: Innocent bystander killed after armed robbery at Mt. Juliet restaurant, police say
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Mom: Kaylee Goncalves was "trapped" during deadly attack
item.description: Family of victim shares new details of their own investigation into what happened the night of the November 2022 murders of four University of Idaho college students and the case against suspect Bryan Kohberger.
